snippet: Applying statistical analysis to the past, Nate Silver evaluates the claims of sports pundits, political handicappers and more.
abstract: Noam Scheiber reviews book The Signal and the Noise: Why So Many Predictions Fail - but Some Don't by Nate Silver.
